code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import rootReducer from"./../reducers/rootReducer";import rootSaga from"./../sagas/rootSaga";var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var enhancer=composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware));var store=createStore(rootReducer,enhancer);sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
